headline: Column: What approach will new Chicago Bears GM Ryan Poles take into free agency?
author: Brad Biggs
sentences: Wide receiver Allen Robinson is expected to sign with a new team when he reaches the open market, and nose tackle Eddie Goldman will be let go if the team cannot find a trade partner.
